mapper.select:
select t.id, t.carno, t.matchid, m.planid, m.materialname, m.sourcename, m.targetname, t.qmpostion, t.createoperaname creator, to_char(t.createdate,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') createdate, t.usermemo from q_quality_t t left join l_applicationbill_item_t m on t.matchid =m.matchid where t.validflag > 0
and m.planid like '%' || #{planid}||'%'
and m.matchid like '%' || #{matchid}||'%'
and t.carno like '%' || #{carno}||'%'
and m.materialname like '%' || #{materialname}||'%'
and m.sourcename like '%' || #{sourcename} ||'%'
and m.targetname like '%' || #{targetname}||'%'
and t.qmpostion like '%' || #{qmpostion}||'%'
and t.createdate>= to_date(#{begintime}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and t.createdate <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
order by t.createdate desc
mapper.insert: insert into Q_QUALITY_T (id, validflag, carno, matchid, qmpostioncode, qmpostion, usermemo, sysmemo, createoperacode, createoperaname, unitcode, unitname, createdate, memo1, memo2, memo3, memo4, memo5,cardid) values (Q_QUALITY_S.Nextval, 1, #{carno}, #{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qmpostioncode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qmpostion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usermemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysmemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createoperacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{memo1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update Q_QUALITY_T t set t.validflag=0,t.validflagoperaname=#{canceler,jdbcType=VARCHAR},t.validflagtime=sysdate where t.matchid=#{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update l_curr_temp_t t set t.sampletime = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), t.sampleunitcode = #{qmpostioncode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t.sampleunitname = #{qmpostion,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where matchid = #{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update l_curr_temp_t t set t.sampletime = '', t.sampleunitcode = '', t.sampleunitname = '' where matchid = #{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select b.carno, b.matchid, c.planid, c.orderno, c.sourcename, c.middlemanname, c.sourceplace, c.targetname, c.materialname, b.createdate, b.createoperaname from l_applicationbill_t b left outer join l_applicationbill_item_t c on (b.matchid = c.matchid and c.validflag > 0) where b.validflag = 1 and b.types = 0 and not exists (select 0 from q_quality_t d where d.validflag > 0 and b.matchid = d.matchid) and b.carno = #{carno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by b.createdate desc

select b.carno, b.matchid, c.planid, c.orderno, c.sourcename, c.middlemanname, c.sourceplace, c.targetname, c.materialname from l_applicationbill_t b left outer join l_applicationbill_item_t c on b.matchid = c.matchid and c.validflag > 0 where b.validflag = 1 and b.matchid=#{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
